title: Drawing, "Jones: Coffee Table", April 9, 1937
medium: Graphite, green color pencil and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8610/F.S./JONES., DILLM./OLSSON/4.9.37, 4/9/37, 1, MASTER; inscribed in graphite, left of stamp: 1 COFFEE TABLE 43 1/2" x 24" x 19"/SOLID STRAIGHT GRAIN WALNUT UPRIGHTS/& WALNUT BURL/TOP - TUFLEX GLASS 1/2" THICK; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for coffee table. Rectangular top surface in Tuflex glass with rounded edges; lower shelf in walnut burl. Legs at left and right side in solid straight grain walnut.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jones: Coffee Table", April 9, 1937.
April 9, 1937. Graphite, green color pencil and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-932.
